CustomField.formula: IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c,"In Signatures"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status__c,"Fully Signed"), OR( $Permission.CLM_Account_Manager_Permission, $Permission.CLM_Contract_Manager_Permission )), IF(OR($User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4d', $User.UIThemeDisplayed == 'Theme4t'), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__ActivateAgreement?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__LightningResource/images/actions/activate.svg", "Activate"),"_self") , HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__AgreementActivate?id=" &Id, IMAGE("/resource/Apttus__LightningResource/images/actions/activate.svg", "Activate"),"_self")),NULL)
CustomField.label: Activate_New
